## Overview

The Hong Kong Hospital Authority coordinates antimicrobial resistance surveillance across the public hospital system in Hong Kong. With comprehensive data from all public hospitals, the system provides critical insights into resistance patterns and supports evidence-based antimicrobial stewardship programs across the region.

## Key Features

- **Comprehensive Coverage**: All public hospitals in Hong Kong
- **Integrated System**: Links to electronic health records
- **Real-Time Surveillance**: Continuous monitoring and reporting
- **Quality Control**: Standardized laboratory methods
- **Antimicrobial Stewardship**: Direct integration with stewardship programs
- **Regional Collaboration**: Participation in Greater China surveillance networks

## Use Cases in Research

- Hong Kong AMR trends and epidemiology
- Healthcare-associated infection surveillance
- Antimicrobial stewardship program evaluation
- Regional resistance pattern comparisons
- Outbreak detection and investigation
- Treatment guideline development

## Getting Started

Visit the [Hong Kong Hospital Authority website](https://www.ha.org.hk/) to learn about AMR surveillance programs.
